trends: There have been 41 other sightings in Fort Wayne
There were no other sightings in Fort Wayne on or around October 12th 2012
Summary: bright white light in strait line path
divs: Sighting Details I went outside my front door and was looking to the sky as it was a clear night. I observed a bright white light moving in a straight line. I went back inside the house and got my binoculars(7x35) and went outside to observe this light. I kept eyes on until it faded to orange then faded out at about 40 degrees. Possible sat., or space station?..I spent yrs as a MUFON CFI, so yes, I am a trained observer, and my thought is a sat of some sort, however I took the time to fill this out as I thought it was a little unusual and bright this late in the eve..
